extendedInfo.description: Clear Menu new mobile service application enables you, as a guest of a restaurant registered to the service, to receive the restaurant menu in your native language. Clear Menu is a helpful innovative solution that translates with ease restaurant menus into any required language.To use Clear Menu mobile application, simply scan the unique QR code that appears in registered restaurants, and you will get full information about the restaurant , restaurant menus and its special dish, navigate between the menus, select your preferred choices and present them to the waiterâ and all in a very clear and easy way and in your own language. Clear Menu is an app that links between customers and service providers, diners and restaurants, and allows them to communicate better with each other, to have a clear understanding of menus and existing information, to be aware of special offers and courses, view orders, add favorites, add notes, share information with others, etc. So, go ahead â¦"Feel at home away from home"â¦ make your travelling experience more personal, more comfortable, more fun and clearerâ¦ simply start using Clear Menu!
